name: l2script
description: Simple scripting language for creating art and animations. Designed for teaching people to code.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && rm -Rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist/public && cp src/*.js dist/ && cp src/public/*.html dist/public/ && cp src/public/*.css dist/public/ && tsc && webpack
